errors.error_description: Specifies outdated Python 2.7 compatibility when the project likely requires Python 3.x
correction_candidates: Change to 'Iris-grib requires Python 3.8 or later' to match modern requirements
Update to 'Iris-grib requires Python 3.6+ for compatibility with current dependencies'
Specify 'Iris-grib requires Python 3.9 or newer' for latest feature support
Change to 'Iris-grib supports Python 3.7 and above' following NEP 29 policy
errors.golden_answer: Change to 'Iris-grib requires Python 3.8 or later' to match modern requirements

errors.error_description: Pins to a specific old version 0.15.0 instead of allowing latest version installation
correction_candidates: Remove version pin to use 'pip install iris-grib' for latest version
Use 'pip install iris-grib>=0.15.0' to allow newer versions
Change to 'pip install iris-grib~=0.15.0' for compatible patch versions
Update to 'pip install "iris-grib>=0.15.0,<1.0.0"' for safe version range
errors.golden_answer: Remove version pin to use 'pip install iris-grib' for latest version
